mapper.insert: insert into job_record (cst_create, cst_modified, user_id, job_id, start_time, end_time, is_present) values (current_timestamp(), current_timestamp(), #{userId}, #{jobId}, #{startTime}, #{startTime}, #{present});
mapper.update: update job_record set user_id = #{userId}, job_id = #{jobId}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, is_present = #{present}, cst_modified = current_timestamp() where id = #{id} and is_deleted = false;
